list_translation_mean.translate_mean: đồ để đo một phần tư

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a unit of liquid capacity equal to a quarter of a gallon or two pints, equivalent in the US to approximately 0.94 liter and in Britain to approximately 1.13 liters.
the fourth of eight standard parrying positions.
(in piquet) a sequence of four cards of the same suit.
